name: King of Dead
description:
In King of Dead, the real-time-strategy mobile MMO game, all evil revive. Ghosts and monsters howl and groan in the dark lairs. No one can hide from them. It is purgatory filled with blood and shattered hearts. Terror and despair corrode humans, who twist up in nightmare. Countless dead creatures are coming. Who can save humanity? Global real players are going to be the savior and kill King of Dead.

FEATURES
—Global MMO Strategy Game
Join global real players to build strong fortresses, train elite armies, raise intelligent heroes, nurture powerful creatures, make reliable alliances and attack dangerous enemies. Come to make friends and fight with global players in this MMO strategy game!

—High-level Strategy
To be King of Dead, you need careful planning and cunning strategy. Heroes, monsters, magic, arms, resources and so on, all the factors are important in the league. Think it over and perfect your lineup. Find the best strategy to strike down your opponent!

—Powerful Heroes
Multiple heroes can help you win the battle. Different heroes have different skills, and their special abilities are the keys to get the victory in the battle and make a well-developed kingdom.

—Fierce Battles
Gorgeous graphics offer you a thrill and splendid battle experience! Win Trophies, Crowns and Glories via a hot battle and conquer the enemy’s kingdom.

—Easy migration
Rebuilding your empire on new lands just need a simple tap! Don't hesitate to start a new adventure in the wonderful land. Welcome to the new land, my Lord!

—Instant Voice Chat
Chat with teammates freely via voice message, more efficiently and conveniently. Free your fingers completely!
